B E F G H I P R S T U V

U

uicc.usim.access - package uicc.usim.access
This package provides the means for applets to get access to the files defined in the USIM,SIM and ISIM specification.
uicc.usim.geolocation - package uicc.usim.geolocation
 
uicc.usim.toolkit - package uicc.usim.toolkit
This package provides the means for the toolkit applets to register to the events defined in the USAT and STK specification , to handle TLV information and to send proactive command according to the ETSI 3GPP TS 31.111 and 3GPP TS 51.014 specification.
UNABLE_TO_ACHIEVE_ACCURACY - Static variable in exception uicc.usim.geolocation.GeoLocationException
This reason code (= 4) is used to indicate that the requested accuracy cannot be achieved
UNABLE_TO_PROCESS_COMMAND - Static variable in exception uicc.usim.geolocation.GeoLocationException
This reason code (= 3) is used to indicate that the operation could not be processed
UNCERTAINTY_OF_HORIZONTAL_VELOCITY_REQUESTED - Static variable in interface uicc.usim.geolocation.GeoLocation
Uncertainty of horizontal velocity requested in addition to horizontal velocity
UNCERTAINTY_OF_VERTICAL_VELOCITY_REQUESTED - Static variable in interface uicc.usim.geolocation.GeoLocation
Uncertainty of vertical velocity requested in addition to horizontal and vertical velocity
USATEnvelopeHandler - Interface in uicc.usim.toolkit
The USATEnvelopeHandler interface contains basic methods to handle the SMS Envelope data field.
USATEnvelopeHandlerSystem - Class in uicc.usim.toolkit
The USATEnvelopeHandlerSystem class provides the means to retrieve an instance of an Object implementing the USATEnvelopeHandler interface.
USATTerminalProfile - Interface in uicc.usim.toolkit
The USATTerminalProfile interface contains constants for the Terminal Profile according to TS 51.014 and to TS 31.111
USIMConstants - Interface in uicc.usim.access
The USIMConstants interface hold all the constants defined in 3GPP TS 31.102
